summary: A Dark Age is coming to Skyrim...
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eE8bu25.jpg[/img]

A Dark Age is coming to Skyrim...

Add-on fantasy horror mod currently under development. [R2] simply adds eight new spells. All can be purchased at the Wizard College and other select vendors. 
[b]
War & Mythos - [8] Uncommon Spells [/b]

[1] Mage Armor Light: Create a longer lasting candlelight that adds a minor mage armor protection. 
[2] Conjure Horse: Summons a ghostly steed to ride that you never have to feed or stable. 
[3] Frost Drain: A stronger version of frostbite with an added drain attack. 
[4] Conjure Dire Rat: Summon a highly diseased rat to fight by your side. 
[5] Bound Spectral Sword: Creates a bound sword and gives the caster a phantom-like appearance. 
[6] Conjure White Lady: Summon the fabled White Lady for an extended period, to aid you in battle.
[7] Shadow Cloak: A half duration shadow invisibility spell accessible at Adept level. 
[8] Conjure Dire Bear: Summon a Dire Bear for an extended period, to aid you in battle. 

GM-X 
[url=http://adventrpg.com/]AdventRPG.com[/url]
author: AdventRPG
